reasoning: The user wants to create a JSON representation of an iterative plan for developing a simple TODO app. The plan involves several AI agents with specific roles. The JSON should outline the reasoning, roles, and ordered tasks, including dependencies, based on the provided markdown file and team member descriptions. The plan starts with parallelized Task-Agnostic Step (TAS) extraction, followed by harmonization, prompt refinement, knowledge transfer, meta-reflection, and an iterative expansion cycle. Each task needs to be assigned to the correct role and team member, with dependencies clearly defined.

roles.title: Task-Agnostic Step (TAS) extractor
roles.description: Identifies and extracts Task-Agnostic Steps (TAS) towards a high-level goal.

roles.title: Prompt Engineer
roles.description: Structures workflows and ensures clarity in agent instructions, system prompt engineering.

roles.title: Engineer
roles.description: Implements designs into clean, modular, and performant code, focusing on responsive design and accessibility.

roles.title: Designer
roles.description: Generates aesthetic layouts, color palettes, typography, and UI flows, ensuring accessibility and visual balance.

roles.title: Unknown
roles.description: Role with an undefined goal, likely for meta-analysis or creative input.

roles.title: AI Tutor
roles.description: Facilitates knowledge transfer between agents and ensures understanding of tasks and their interrelations.

tasks.task: Independently extract Task-Agnostic Steps (TAS) towards building a simple TODO app.
tasks.name: GPTASe

tasks.task: Independently extract Task-Agnostic Steps (TAS) towards building a simple TODO app.
tasks.name: TASe

tasks.task: Independently extract Task-Agnostic Steps (TAS) towards building a simple TODO app.
tasks.name: uTASe

tasks.task: Compare the three sets of TAS to identify overlaps, unique contributions, and inconsistencies, and merge into a unified TAS list.
tasks.name: GPTASe

tasks.task: Engineer system prompts for TAS extractors to avoid redundancy, ensure consistent granularity, and guide iterative detail expansion.
tasks.name: Lyra

tasks.task: Ensure all team members understand the refined TAS list, providing contextual notes on importance and interrelations.
tasks.name: aitutor

tasks.task: Analyze collaborative dynamics, highlight blind spots, and inject meta-perspectives (e.g., questioning assumptions, surfacing creativity).
tasks.name: fizzlametta

tasks.task: Iteratively refine TAS, prompts, and collective understanding by cycling back through Steps 1-7 until the TODO app plan is clear, minimal, and actionable.
tasks.name: Lyra
